Package tools.io

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExceptionInputStream
    Interface for adding functionality on top of a class extending InputStream.
    StreamClosedListener
    Listener class for capturing stream closures.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockBufferInputStream
    Abstract class for making an InputStream which accepts only (dynamic) chunks of data instead of a stream.
    BlockBufferOutputStream
    Abstract class for making an OutputStream which accepts only (dynamic) chunks of data instead of a stream.
    BufferedReaderPlus
    Provides an easy way of processing a data file.
    ExceptionInputStreamWrapper
    Wrapper class to convert an InputStream to an ExceptionInputStream and vice verca.
    FileTools
    Tool classes for all kinds of file operation.
    ImageSheetLoader
    Provides a convinient way of storing image sheets for a multi-threaded environment.
    MultiZipInputStream
    Input stream for multiple zip files.
    MultiZipOutputStream
    Output stream which writes a stream of data to one or more zip files.
    NullOutputStream
    This is an output stream implementation which ignores all data written to it.
    NullWriter
    This is a writer implementation which ignores all data written to it.
    OutputStreamClosedNotifier
    Wrapper class for attaching a listener for detecting the closing of a stream.
    PartFile
    Extends the File class by supporting operations for files with a base path.
    PartialInputStream
    Input stream for reading a part of another input stream.
    StringOutputStream
    Wrapper class to easily allow strings to be written to a OutputStream.
    ZipTool Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Ancient class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InsufficientDataException
    This exception should be thrown when not enough data is available.
